name: AE Solitaire
description:
Play the #1 solitaire card game on App Store! If you like Windows Solitaire, you're going to love this SOLITAIRE! !

Classic Solitaire, also known as Patience Solitaire and Klondike Solitaire, is the most popular solitaire card game in the world. The addicting card game you’ve been playing on your computer for years now goes wherever you do.

With crisp, clear cards, beautiful graphics, perfect winning animations, and a straight forward layout, this solitair app is one you do not want to be without. And we will constantly update solitair to include fun new features!

Our patience klondike solitaire now has 20+ brand new themes for you to play with! Choose from Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter and cute animals' themes as your new solitair background and solitair card back.

Tap to move cards for quick gameplay, or drag them to destination. You can choose to draw 1 card or draw 3 cards, and standard scoring or vegas scoring.

Haven't won in a while? The Winning Deals feature creates a game that deals hands guaranteed to have at least one winning solution.

Classic Solitaire Features:
- Daily Challenges
- Winning Deals
- Theme Packs
- Draw 1 card
- Draw 3 cards
- Portrait or Landscape
- Right or left handed play
- Unlimited undo and hints
- Auto complete to finish game
- Modern Card Fonts
- Custom backgrounds and card backs
- Standard klondike scoring, and Vegas scoring
- Game state saved when interrupted
- Statistics

Puzzling card layouts and special excitement and twists that you won’t find in classic solitaire card games like Pyramid, Tripeaks, Spider, or Free Cell solitaire.

The familiar windows solitaire game you used to play on your computer is now available on the go! Download solitaire free today!
